update.description:
The ignition-gui homebrew bottle builds seemed to fail all the time during the `brew test` phase, with console messages like:

~~~
[GUI] [Err] [Application.cc:653] [QT] Cannot create window: no screens available
~~~

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder%2Flabel%3Dosx_mojave&build=564)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_mojave/564/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_mojave/564/

I just remembered that we set the `DISPLAY` variable in the [project-default-devel-homebrew-amd64.bash](#!/osrf/release-tools/src/d4f731053e94e6dc78f4e60f77589ad88657d11b/jenkins-scripts/lib/project-default-devel-homebrew-amd64.bash#lines-101:107), so I added it to the bottle build script, and now it seems to be passing:

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder%2Flabel%3Dosx_mojave&build=565)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_mojave/565/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_mojave/565/
update.title: set DISPLAY when building bottles
